Summary: Saw 3 red/orange lights while driving home from work
divs: sighting details was on my way home from work at approx 12:40 am and on the phone with my brother. i was on big beaver rd. heading east, and was about to turn right onto rochester road when i saw this red\orange light flickering and moving west. it was about to cross my path and was maybe 50 feet above me beneath the low lying cloud cover. i pulled into the parking lot and stopped to watch it as i thought it was a chinese lantern or something like that. i realized that it was not a lantern and was red light moving without sound, and it was not windy outside. then a second light came into view, running parallel to the ground and following this light. that's when i got off the phone, got out of my car, and attempted to use my iphone to record. once i got out of the car, the lights started moving farther away and higher in the sky. a third light came into view and then all three formed a triangular pattern. they stayed in that position for a bit, and then disappeared one by one. my video was shaky as i got back into my car and tried to pull past the large lights in the parking lot so that i would not have any light pollution in the video. all i can say was it was extremely strange and i have never seen anything like that before in my life. did anyone else witness this? i know there were other drivers at that intersection at that time.
